dublin_core.dcvalue: A mobile-based registration process for eligible beneficiaries of supplemental food rations using Android tablets. The program also serves as a photo verification system of beneficiary status and provides a verifiable record of the distribution process.
Barry Elkin, Food Security Technical Director, ACDI/VOCA, Email: belkin@acdivoca.org | John Stanton, Global Program Manager, JSI, Email: jstanton@pfscm.org
The Liberian Agriculture Upgrading , Nutrition and Child Health (LAUNCH) Project
Monitoring and Evaluation, Supply Chain management, Child Health, Nutrition
